local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")

local TypeList = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Info.TypeList)

local MaxAttackLevel = 3

local DiceRoll = {
	[0] = { Damage = {20000, 60000}, SPA = {5.5, 8}, Range = {20, 35} },
	[1] = { Damage = {285000, 701000}, SPA = {5.5, 7.5}, Range = {30, 44} },
	[2] = { Damage = {708000, 1245000}, SPA = {5, 7}, Range = {45, 60} },
	[3] = { Damage = {1002000, 1756000}, SPA = {4, 5.5}, Range = {55, 80} },
}

local TAG_ROLL = "DICEROLL_ROLL"
local TAG_UPG = "DICEROLL_UPG"

local function getInfo(unit: Model)
	return unit and unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
end

local function getStats(unit: Model)
	local info = getInfo(unit)
	return info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
end

local ATTACK_UPG_ATTR = "DiceRoll_AttackUpgrade"

local function getAttackUpgrade(unit: Model): number
	local v = unit:GetAttribute(ATTACK_UPG_ATTR)
	if typeof(v) ~= "number" then
		return 0
	end
	return math.clamp(math.floor(v), 0, MaxAttackLevel)
end

local function setAttackUpgrade(unit: Model, upg: number)
	unit:SetAttribute(ATTACK_UPG_ATTR, math.clamp(math.floor(tonumber(upg) or 0), 0, MaxAttackLevel))
end

local function ensureIntValue(parent: Instance, name: string, defaultValue: number)
	local v = parent:FindFirstChild(name)
	if not v then
		v = Instance.new("IntValue")
		v.Name = name
		v.Value = defaultValue or 0
		v.Parent = parent
	end
	return v
end

local function getRng(unit: Model): Random
	local info = getInfo(unit)
	if not info then
		return Random.new()
	end

	local seedVal = info:FindFirstChild("DiceRollSeed")
	if not seedVal then
		seedVal = Instance.new("IntValue")
		seedVal.Name = "DiceRollSeed"
		seedVal.Value = math.random(1, 2_000_000_000)
		seedVal.Parent = info
	end

	seedVal.Value = (seedVal.Value * 1103515245 + 12345) % 2_000_000_000
	return Random.new(seedVal.Value)
end

local function randFloat(r: Random, a: number, b: number)
	if a > b then a, b = b, a end
	return a + (b - a) * r:NextNumber()
end

local function rollTargets(unit: Model)
	local upg = getAttackUpgrade(unit)
	local entry = DiceRoll[upg]
	if not entry then return end

	local r = getRng(unit)

	local dmg = math.floor(randFloat(r, entry.Damage[1], entry.Damage[2]) + 0.5)
	local spa = randFloat(r, entry.SPA[1], entry.SPA[2])
	local range = randFloat(r, entry.Range[1], entry.Range[2])

	return dmg, spa, range
end

local function applyDiceRoll(unit: Model)
	local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)

	local stats = getStats(unit)
	if not stats then return end

	Methods.RemoveFixedBuff(unit, TAG_ROLL)
	Methods.RecalculateStats(unit)

	local curDmg = 0
	local curSpa = stats and stats:FindFirstChild("SPA") and stats.SPA.Value or 0
	local curRange = 0

	local tgtDmg, tgtSpa, tgtRange = rollTargets(unit)
	if not tgtDmg then return end

	tgtSpa = math.max(0.1, tgtSpa)
	tgtRange = math.max(0, tgtRange)

	Methods.AddFixedBuff(unit, TAG_ROLL, {
		Damage = (tgtDmg - curDmg),
		SPA = (tgtSpa - curSpa),
		Range = (tgtRange - curRange),
	})
end


return {

	Type = TypeList.Steel,
	PlacementLimit = 2,

	Passives = {

			local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)

			ThisUnit:SetAttribute(ATTACK_UPG_ATTR, 0)

local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local TypeList = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Info.TypeList)

local STEP = 0.10
local CAP  = 1.00
local IDLE_RESET = 15

local function getInfoStatsBuffs(unit: Model)
	local info = unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
	local stats = info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
	local buffs = info and info:FindFirstChild("Buffs")

	return info, stats, buffs
end

local function ensureDamageBuff(unit: Model)
	local info, _, buffs = getInfoStatsBuffs(unit)
	if not info then
		return nil
	end

	if not buffs then
		buffs = Instance.new("Folder")
		buffs.Name = "Buffs"
		buffs.Parent = info
	end

	local dmgBuff = buffs:FindFirstChild("Damage")
	if not dmgBuff then
		dmgBuff = Instance.new("NumberValue")
		dmgBuff.Name = "Damage"
		dmgBuff.Value = 0
		dmgBuff.Parent = buffs

	end

	if not dmgBuff:IsA("NumberValue") then
		return nil
	end

	return dmgBuff
end

	Passives = {
		OnSpawn = function(ThisUnit: Model)

			if not RunService:IsServer() then
				return
			end

			if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then
				return
			end

			if ThisUnit:GetAttribute("AtkStackInit") then
				return
			end

			ThisUnit:SetAttribute("AtkStackInit", true)
			ThisUnit:SetAttribute("AtkStacks_LastApplied", 0)
			ThisUnit:SetAttribute("AtkStacks_Token", 0)

			-- sanity: ensure dmg buff exists at spawn
			local dmgBuff = ensureDamageBuff(ThisUnit)
		end,

		OnAttack = function(Player, ThisUnit: Model)
			if not RunService:IsServer() then
				return
			end

			if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then
				return
			end

			local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)

			local dmgBuff = ensureDamageBuff(ThisUnit)
			if not dmgBuff then
				return
			end

			local lastApplied = ThisUnit:GetAttribute("AtkStacks_LastApplied") or 0
			local desired = math.min(CAP, lastApplied + STEP)

			if desired ~= lastApplied then
				dmgBuff.Value -= lastApplied
				dmgBuff.Value += desired
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute("AtkStacks_LastApplied", desired)

				Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
			else
			end

			local token = (ThisUnit:GetAttribute("AtkStacks_Token") or 0) + 1
			ThisUnit:SetAttribute("AtkStacks_Token", token)

			task.delay(IDLE_RESET, function()
				if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then
					return
				end

				local currentToken = ThisUnit:GetAttribute("AtkStacks_Token") or 0
				if currentToken ~= token then
					return
				end

				local currentApplied = ThisUnit:GetAttribute("AtkStacks_LastApplied") or 0

					local dmgBuff2 = ensureDamageBuff(ThisUnit)
					if not dmgBuff2 then

					Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)

			end)

local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")

local TypeList = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Info.TypeList)
local SpeedLibrary = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Core.Speed)
local TaskLibrary = SpeedLibrary.TaskLibrary

local PASSIVE_TAG = "GuildRivalryChoiBaek"
local STARTED_ATTR = PASSIVE_TAG .. "_Started"
local ACTIVE_ATTR = PASSIVE_TAG .. "_Active"
local LAST_ATTR = PASSIVE_TAG .. "_LastApplied"
local BUFF_VALUE_NAME = "Damage"

local DMG_PER_UNIT = 25
local TICK = 0.25

local QUALIFYING = {
	Rare = true,
	Epic = true,
	Legendary = true,
}

local function getInfoStatsBuffs(unit: Model)
	local info = unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
	local stats = info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
	local buffs = info and info:FindFirstChild("Buffs")
	return info, stats, buffs
end

local function getUnitRarity(unit: Model)
	local attr = unit:GetAttribute("Rarity")
	if attr ~= nil then
		return attr
	end

	local UnitData = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Info.UnitData)

	local entry = UnitData[unit.Name]
	return entry and entry.Rarity
end

local function inRange(a: Model, b: Model, range: number): boolean
	local aHRP = a:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	local bHRP = b:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	if not aHRP or not bHRP then return false end
	return (aHRP.Position - bHRP.Position).Magnitude <= range
end

local function isQualifyingUnit(u: Model): boolean
	local rarity = getUnitRarity(u)
	if not rarity then return false end
	return QUALIFYING[tostring(rarity)] == true
end

return {
	CanTrade = true, DisplayName = "S-Rank Bomber",
	Rarity = "Mythic",
	PlaceType = "Hill",
	Type = TypeList.Fire,
	PlacementLimit = 5,
	
	TagTeamWith = "BaekEvo",
	TagTeamRange = 20,
	TagTeamEffect = {
		OnActivate = function(ThisUnit: Model, partnerUnit: Model?)
			if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
			if not ThisUnit or ThisUnit.Parent ~= workspace.Units then return end

			local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)
			local _, stats, buffs = getInfoStatsBuffs(ThisUnit)
			if not stats or not buffs then return end

			ThisUnit:SetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR, true)

			local dmgBuff = buffs:FindFirstChild(BUFF_VALUE_NAME)
			if not dmgBuff then
				dmgBuff = Instance.new("NumberValue")
				dmgBuff.Name = BUFF_VALUE_NAME
				dmgBuff.Value = 0
				dmgBuff.Parent = buffs
			end

			if ThisUnit:GetAttribute(STARTED_ATTR) then
				return
			end
			ThisUnit:SetAttribute(STARTED_ATTR, true)
			
			local function cleanup()
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR, false)

				local lastApplied = ThisUnit:GetAttribute(LAST_ATTR) or 0
				if dmgBuff and dmgBuff.Parent then
					dmgBuff.Value -= lastApplied
					if math.abs(dmgBuff.Value) < 1e-9 then
						dmgBuff:Destroy()
					end
				end

				ThisUnit:SetAttribute(LAST_ATTR, 0)
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute(STARTED_ATTR, false)

				if ThisUnit.Parent then
					Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
				end
			end

			local function recompute()
				if not ThisUnit or ThisUnit.Parent ~= workspace.Units then return end
				if not ThisUnit:GetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR) then return end

				local range = 20
				local myPos = ThisUnit:GetPivot().Position

				local count = 0
				for _, u in ipairs(workspace.Units:GetChildren()) do
					if u ~= ThisUnit and u.Parent == workspace.Units then
						local dist = (myPos - u:GetPivot().Position).Magnitude
						if dist <= range and isQualifyingUnit(u) then
							count += 1
						end
					end
				end

				local desired = (count * DMG_PER_UNIT) / 100
				local lastApplied = ThisUnit:GetAttribute(LAST_ATTR) or 0

				if desired ~= lastApplied then
					dmgBuff.Value = (dmgBuff.Value - lastApplied) + desired
					ThisUnit:SetAttribute(LAST_ATTR, desired)
					Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
				end
			end

			recompute()
			
			partnerUnit.Destroying:Once(cleanup)
			ThisUnit.Destroying:Once(cleanup)

			task.spawn(function()
				while ThisUnit and ThisUnit.Parent == workspace.Units do
					if not ThisUnit:GetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR) then
						break
					end

					recompute()
					TaskLibrary.wait(TICK)
				end
			end)
		end,
	},

	TagTeamData = {
		Title = "Guild Rivalry",
		Description = "For every Rare/Epic/Legendary unit placed in this unit's tag team range, this unit gains +25% damage per unit.",
	},

	[0] = {
		TargetType = "Hybrid",
		ModuleName = "Attack1", Ability = "", AOEType = "Circle", AOESize = Vector3.one * 16, StatusList = {"Burn"},
		Cost = 1100, Damage = 2700, Range = 24, SPA = 5,
	},
	
	[1] = {

		Cost = 2800, Damage = 6600, Range = 28, SPA = 5,
	},
	
	[2] = {

		ModuleName = "Attack2", Ability = "", AOEType = "Circle", AOESize = Vector3.one * 10, StatusList = {"Burn"},
		Cost = 4000, Damage = 8000, Range = 32, SPA = 5,
	},
	
	[3] = {

		Cost = 6000, Damage = 13400, Range = 36, SPA = 5,

}

local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")

local TypeList = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Info.TypeList)
local SpeedLibrary = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Core.Speed)
local TaskLibrary = SpeedLibrary.TaskLibrary

local PASSIVE_TAG = "GuildRivalryChoiBaek"
local STARTED_ATTR = PASSIVE_TAG .. "_Started"
local ACTIVE_ATTR = PASSIVE_TAG .. "_Active"
local LAST_ATTR = PASSIVE_TAG .. "_LastApplied"
local BUFF_VALUE_NAME = "Damage"

local DMG_PER_UNIT = 25
local TICK = 0.25

local QUALIFYING = {
	Rare = true,
	Epic = true,
	Legendary = true,
}

local function getInfoStatsBuffs(unit: Model)
	local info = unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
	local stats = info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
	local buffs = info and info:FindFirstChild("Buffs")
	return info, stats, buffs
end

local function getUnitRarity(unit: Model)
	local attr = unit:GetAttribute("Rarity")
	if attr ~= nil then
		return attr
	end
	
	local UnitData = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Info.UnitData)
	
	local entry = UnitData[unit.Name]
	return entry and entry.Rarity
end

local function inRange(a: Model, b: Model, range: number): boolean
	local aHRP = a:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	local bHRP = b:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	if not aHRP or not bHRP then return false end
	return (aHRP.Position - bHRP.Position).Magnitude <= range
end

local function isQualifyingUnit(u: Model): boolean
	local rarity = getUnitRarity(u)
	if not rarity then return false end
	return QUALIFYING[tostring(rarity)] == true
end

return {
	CanTrade = true,
	DisplayName = "Beast Hunter [Wrath]",
	Rarity = "Mythic",
	PlaceType = "Ground",
	Type = TypeList.Neutral,
	PlacementLimit = 3,

	TagTeamWith = "Choi",
	TagTeamRange = 20,

	TagTeamEffect = {
		OnActivate = function(ThisUnit: Model, partnerUnit: Model?)
			if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
			if not ThisUnit or ThisUnit.Parent ~= workspace.Units then return end

			local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)
			local _, stats, buffs = getInfoStatsBuffs(ThisUnit)
			if not stats or not buffs then return end

			ThisUnit:SetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR, true)

			local dmgBuff = buffs:FindFirstChild(BUFF_VALUE_NAME)
			if not dmgBuff then
				dmgBuff = Instance.new("NumberValue")
				dmgBuff.Name = BUFF_VALUE_NAME
				dmgBuff.Value = 0
				dmgBuff.Parent = buffs
			end

			if ThisUnit:GetAttribute(STARTED_ATTR) then
				return
			end
			ThisUnit:SetAttribute(STARTED_ATTR, true)
			
			local function cleanup()
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR, false)
				
				local lastApplied = ThisUnit:GetAttribute(LAST_ATTR) or 0
				if dmgBuff and dmgBuff.Parent then
					dmgBuff.Value -= lastApplied
					if math.abs(dmgBuff.Value) < 1e-9 then
						dmgBuff:Destroy()
					end
				end

				ThisUnit:SetAttribute(LAST_ATTR, 0)
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute(STARTED_ATTR, false)

				if ThisUnit.Parent then
					Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
				end
			end

			local function recompute()
				if not ThisUnit or ThisUnit.Parent ~= workspace.Units then return end
				if not ThisUnit:GetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR) then return end

				local range = 20
				local myPos = ThisUnit:GetPivot().Position

				local count = 0
				for _, u in ipairs(workspace.Units:GetChildren()) do
					if u ~= ThisUnit and u.Parent == workspace.Units then
						local dist = (myPos - u:GetPivot().Position).Magnitude
						if dist <= range and isQualifyingUnit(u) then
							count += 1
						end
					end
				end

				local desired = (count * DMG_PER_UNIT) / 100
				local lastApplied = ThisUnit:GetAttribute(LAST_ATTR) or 0

				if desired ~= lastApplied then
					dmgBuff.Value = (dmgBuff.Value - lastApplied) + desired
					ThisUnit:SetAttribute(LAST_ATTR, desired)
					Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
				end
			end

			recompute()
			
			partnerUnit.Destroying:Once(cleanup)
			ThisUnit.Destroying:Once(cleanup)

			task.spawn(function()
				while ThisUnit and ThisUnit.Parent == workspace.Units do
					if not ThisUnit:GetAttribute(ACTIVE_ATTR) then
						break
					end

					recompute()
					TaskLibrary.wait(TICK)
				end
			end)
		end,
	},

	TagTeamData = {
		Title = "Guild Rivalry",
		Description = "For every Rare/Epic/Legendary unit placed in this unit's tag team range, this unit gains +25% damage per unit.",
	},

	PassivesData = {

			Title = "Instinct",

				[2] = { Words = { "-30% SPA" }, Color = Color3.fromRGB(55, 200, 255) },
			},
		},
	},
